American families still reeling from COVID-19 will need all the help they can get as our nation recovers.    Don't let Left-wing Democrats in Washington sink our economy with tax hikes. Help us retake the majority in the House this fall: https://t.co/QtwwY54H5q

In 2017 President Trump and Republicans in Congress passed historic middle class tax relief. If Socialist Democrats take full control of Congress these tax cuts will be the first thing on the chopping block.   Your taxes will go up because of it and the economy will suffer too.

Medicare for All? $32 trillion.  Green New Deal? $93 trillion.   Progressive Wish List Touted as "COVID-19 Response Bill"? $3 trillion.   Who is going to pay for the Democrats' spending obsession?  Hardworking middle-class American families.   These are the stakes this November.

Left-wing socialists are now demanding what amounts to lunacy — defund our police officers.  It's just their latest idea to reshape America into their progressive vision.   This is why taking back the House is so important next fall.    JOIN OUR TEAM: https://t.co/QtwwY5miu0
